00133 #     if (DEBUG)

00283 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00284   inline Matrix<D, N>::Matrix() {
00285     ConstructLoop<D, D-1, D-1>::row_loop (data_);
00286   }
00287 
00288 
00301 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00302     inline Matrix<D, N>::Matrix(unsigned axis1, unsigned axis2, N alpha) {
00303         ConstructLoop<D, D-1, D-1>::row_loop (data_);
00304         N s = sin (alpha), c = cos (alpha);
00305         data_[axis1][axis1] =  data_[axis2][axis2] = c;
00306         data_[axis1][axis2] = -s;
00307         data_[axis2][axis1] = s;
00308 
00309       }
00310 
00311 
00320 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00321   inline Matrix<D, N>::Matrix(bool random) {
00322     if (random) {
00323       for(unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00324         for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) data_[i][j] = random? N (rand ())/RAND_MAX: 0;
00325         if (!random) data_[i][i] = 1;
00326       }
00327     }
00328     else {
00329       ConstructLoop<D, D-1, D-1>::row_loop (data_);
00330     }
00331   }
00332 
00333 
00341 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00342     Matrix<D, N>::Matrix (const N a[D][D]) {
00343       CopyLoop<D-1, D-1, D>::copy_row (a, data_);
00344     }
00345 
00346 
00356 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00357   Matrix<D, N>::Matrix (const N *a) {
00358     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)
00359       for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)
00360         data_[i][j] = a[i*D+j];
00361   }

00364 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00365   inline N
00366     Matrix<D, N>::operator() (unsigned i, unsigned j) const {
00367       assert (i < D);
00368       assert (j < D);
00369       return data_[i][j];
00370     }

00382 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00383   inline Matrix<D, N>
00384     Matrix<D, N>::operator* (const Matrix<D, N>& other) {
00385       Matrix<D, N> tmp;
00386       Multiply<D>::multiply (data_, other.data_, tmp.data_);
00387       return tmp;
00388     }

00390 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00391   inline Matrix<D, N>
00392     Matrix<D, N>::operator*= (const Matrix<D, N>& other) {
00393       Matrix<D, N> tmp (*this);
00394       Multiply<D>::multiply (tmp.data_, other.data_, data_);
00395       return *this;
00396     }

00398 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00399   void
00400     Matrix<D, N>::print () {
00401       std::cout << D << "x" << D << ":";
00402       for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00403         std::cout << (i > 0? " |": "") << std::endl << "|";
00404         for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)
00405           std::cout << std::setw (6) << std::setprecision (3)
00406                     << operator ()(i, j);
00407       }
00408       std::cout << " |" << std::endl;
00409     }

00430 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00431   template<unsigned D_, unsigned i, unsigned j>
00432     inline void
00433       Matrix<D, N>::ConstructLoop<D_, i, j>::row_loop (N a[D][D]) {
00434 #       if (DEBUG)
00435           cerr << "Matrix<" << D << ">::ConstructLoop<" << D_
00436                << ", " << i << ", " << j << ">::row_loop ()" << endl;
00437 #       endif
00438         ConstructLoop<D, i, j>::col_loop(a);
00439         ConstructLoop<D, i-1, j>::row_loop(a);
00440       }

00454 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00455   template<unsigned D_, unsigned i, unsigned j>
00456     inline void
00457       Matrix<D, N>::ConstructLoop<D_, i, j>::col_loop (N a[D][D]) {
00458 #       if (DEBUG)
00459           cerr << "Matrix<" << D << ">::ConstructLoop<" << D_ << ", "
00460                << i << ", " << j << ">::col_loop () : "
00461                << (i == j? (N)1: (N)0) << endl;
00462 #       endif
00463         ConstructLoop<D, i, j-1>::col_loop(a);
00464         a[i][j] = (i == j? (N)1: (N)0);
00465       }

00579 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00580   template <unsigned i, unsigned j, unsigned k, unsigned D_>
00581     inline void
00582       Matrix<D, N>::MultiplyInnerLoop<i, j, k, D_>::loop (const N a[D][D], const N b[D][D], N c[D][D]) {
00583         c[i][j] += a[i][k]*b[k][j];
00584         MultiplyInnerLoop<i, j, k-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);
00585       }

00600 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00601   template <unsigned i, unsigned j, unsigned D_>
00602     inline void
00603       Matrix<D, N>::MultiplyInnerLoop<i, j, 0, D_>::loop (const N a[D][D], const N b[D][D], N c[D][D]) {
00604         c[i][j] += a[i][0]*b[0][j];
00605       }

00625 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00626   template <unsigned i, unsigned j, unsigned D_>
00627     inline void
00628       Matrix<D, N>::MultiplyColLoop<i, j, D_>::loop (const N a[D][D], const N b[D][D], N c[D][D]) {
00629         c[i][j] = 0;
00630         MultiplyInnerLoop<i, j, D-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);
00631         MultiplyColLoop<i, j-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);
00632       }

00648       Matrix<D, N>::MultiplyColLoop<i, 0, D_>::loop (const N a[D][D], const N b[D][D], N c[D][D]) {
00649         c[i][0] = 0;
00650         MultiplyInnerLoop<i, 0, D-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);

00720 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00721   Matrix<D-1, N>
00722     Matrix<D, N>::matrix_minor (unsigned i, unsigned j) {
00723       throw new NotYetImplementedException ();
00724       Matrix<D-1, N> tmp;
00725       for (unsigned I = 0, II = 0; I < D; I++)
00726         if (I != i) {
00727         for (unsigned J = 0, JJ = 0; J < D; J++)
00728           if (J != j) {
00729           tmp (II, JJ) = *this (I, J);
00730           JJ++;
00731           }
00732           II++;
00733         }
00734         return tmp;
00735   }

00737 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00738   template<unsigned D_>
00739     inline N
00740       Matrix<D, N>::Det<D_>::det (/*const*/ N a[D][D]) {
00741         return SumLoop<D, D-1>::sumloop (a);
00742       }
00743 /*
00744 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00745   template<typename N_>
00746     inline N_
00747       Matrix<D, N>::Det<1, N_>::det (/*const// N_ a[1][1]) {
00748         return a[0][0];
00749       }
00750 */
00751 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00752   template<unsigned D_, int i>
00753     inline N
00754       Matrix<D, N>::SumLoop<D_, i>::sumloop (/*const*/ N a[D][D])  {
00755         N **tmp1 = Minor<i, 0, D>::minor(a);
00756         N tmp2 = a[i][0]
00757                   * Det<D-1>::det(tmp1)
00758                   * ( (i&1)? -1: 1 )
00759                   + SumLoop<D, i-1>::sumloop (a);
00760         delete[] tmp1;
00761         return tmp2;
00762       }
00763 
00764 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00765   template<unsigned D_>
00766     inline N
00767       Matrix<D, N>::SumLoop<D_, 0>::sumloop (/*const*/ N a[D][D]) {
00768         N **tmp1 = Minor<0, 0, D_>::minor (a);
00769         N tmp2 = a[0][0] * Det<D-1>::det (tmp1);
00770         delete [] tmp1;
00771         return tmp2;
00772       }
00773 /*
00774 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00775   template<typename N_>
00776     inline N_
00777       Matrix<D, N>::SumLoop <0, 0, N_>::sumloop (const N_ a[1][1]) {
00778         return a[0][0];
00779       }
00780 */
00781 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00782     template<unsigned k, unsigned D_>
00783         inline void
00784             Matrix<D, N>::MinorLoop<k, D_>::minorloop (N ** a, N **tmp) {
00785               tmp[k-1] = a[k]+1;
00786               MinorLoop<k-1, D>::minorloop (a, tmp);
00787           }
00788 
00789 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00790     template<unsigned D_>
00791         inline void
00792             Matrix<D, N>::MinorLoop<1, D_>::minorloop (N ** a, N **tmp) {
00793               tmp[0] = a[1]+1;
00794             }
00795 
00796 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00797     template<unsigned i, unsigned D_>
00798         inline /*const*/ N **
00799             Matrix<D, N>::Minor<i, 0, D_>::minor (/*const*/ N **a) {
00800               /*const*/ N **tmp = new /*const*/ N* [D-1];  //  watch out for memory leaks here!
00801                                                         //  the caller must free this memory!
00802               for (unsigned k = 1; k < D; k++)
00803                 tmp[k-1] = a[k]+1;
00804               //    MinorLoop<D-1, D>::minorloop (a, tmp);
00805               return tmp;
00806             }
